description: I'm behind the camera once again, bringing you another newbie: Cruz!This heavily inked-up stud is a muscular, built guy who is down to burn it down. I only met him the same day as we shot this solo, but he was ready to do whatever. A man after my own heart!I tell him that I've already got an idea to pair him up with a particular Marine very soon, so I think we'll see the results of that meeting very soon. But, let's focus on our first meeting with Cruz.The 20-year old fella (who turns 21 in August) has got king-sized nipples, a thick body, a winning smile, and a great attitude. He was a former wrestler in high school, and loves going to the gym, listening to music, heading to the beach and playing beach volleyball. He says that he's both nervous and looking forward to getting something put in his ass when he's paired up with a guy (after all, he says, it 'does feel good' to do it). Well, we've got a plan to work him up to taking a dick up his ass -- that is, we're gonna start with some little butt plugs and work out way up the ladder to King Cole. (Ok, ok, I'm kidding!) I have him pull out a little red butt plug and then a little black one, and I tell him that he's going to probably enjoy the black one better (because it's smoother).
title: Cruz - Solo, Scene #01
